3. Create Realm App

Now that you’ve populated your Atlas database, this page will walk you through creating the Realm App and import all the code associated with it (e.g. functions, triggers):

  1. Create the WildAid Realm application:
    1. In the Atlas UI, click the “Realm” icon:

    2. If you get a screen that looks like this, click “Skip questions and start new app”, otherwise skip to the next step


    3. Configure Realm: Give the Realm App a name and link your cluster, then click “Create Realm Application”. Paste this name the Realm App name into the template (example: WildAidApp).

    4. In the top left of your screen, use the “copy” icon to copy the Realm App ID, and paste into the template as “Realm App ID”. The top left of the screen looks like this:
